description: RHash (Recursive Hasher) is a console utility for calculation and verification of magnet links and various message digests, including CRC32, CRC32C, MD4, MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512, SHA3, AICH, ED2K, DC++ TTH, BitTorrent BTIH, Tiger, GOST R 34.11-94, GOST R 34.11-2012, RIPEMD-160, HAS-160, EDON-R, and Whirlpool. Sources: https://github.com/rhash/RHash
